name: flow-view
description: is a visual editor for Dataflow programming, powered by React

scripts.browserify: for x in example dist; do npm run browserify_$x; done
scripts.build: npm run example_render_serverside; npm run browserify && npm run minify; npm run jekyll; git status
scripts.docs:_data: for x in package.json tags.json; do npm run docs:_data:$x; done
scripts.example_basic_usage: NODE_PATH=src budo --serve bundle.js --dir examples/basic/ --open examples/basic/usage.js -- -t babelify
scripts.example_custom_item: NODE_PATH=src budo --serve bundle.js --dir examples/custom/ --open examples/custom/item.js -- -t babelify
scripts.example_empty_canvas: NODE_PATH=src budo --serve bundle.js --dir examples/custom --open examples/empty/canvas.js -- -t babelify
scripts.example_event_emitter: NODE_PATH=src budo --serve bundle.js --dir examples/event/ --open examples/event/emitter.js -- -t babelify
scripts.example_genealogic_tree: NODE_PATH=src budo --serve bundle.js --dir examples/genealogic/ --open examples/genealogic/tree.js -- -t babelify
scripts.example_theme_dark: NODE_PATH=src budo --serve bundle.js --dir examples/theme/ --open examples/theme/dark.js -- -t babelify
scripts.homepage:
echo "---
title: $npm_package_name
flow: /empty.json
---" > docs/index.md; cat README.md >> docs/index.md
scripts.jekyll: npm run homepage; npm run docs:_data; cd docs; jekyll build; cd ..
scripts.lint: for x in src examples; do npm run lint_$x; done
scripts.minify: cd dist; uglifyjs ${npm_package_name}.js --source-map --output ${npm_package_name}.min.js --compress --mangle -b beautify=false,preamble='"// http://g14n.info/flow-view"'; cd -
scripts.preversion: npm run build; npm run babel
scripts.postversion: git push origin v${npm_package_version}; npm publish
scripts.postpublish: npm run docs:_data; git commit -am ':arrow_up: updated version'; git push origin master
